content:
I originally experienced this error when upgrading my MIL installation from about June 6th to July 12th; the same error happens on a fresh clone (revision f37a10703a1978e8321ac2663ae19bbd96c9423c).

Steps to reproduce. Follow the instructions in the book, open the mathematics_in_lean folder in VS Code. Open a non-trivial file, e.g. C02_Basics/S01_Calculating.lean` and wait for lean to start.
Actual results. Building fails, with the following error message.

This means I can't work through MIL right now. Any hints or a quick fix would be appreciated. Thanks a lot!

/home/[redacted]/.elan/toolchains/leanprover--lean4---nightly-2023-06-20/bin/lake print-paths Init Mathlib.Data.Nat.Basic Mathlib.Data.Nat.Parity Mathlib.Tactic` failed:

Did you try lake exe cache get! to redownload cache files?
I could've sworn I did this - but trying it out now fixes the issue. Thank you!
Michael Rothgang has marked this topic as resolved.
